price: (31) Except Iblees;[676] he refused to be with those who prostrated.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: [676]- Who was of the jinn.  See 18:50.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
